summary: Famous but unlucky pursuers of Fantomas from France go to weird Scotland for a final attempt to bring the impudent criminal to justice.
cast: Jean Marais|Louis de Funès|Mylène Demongeot|Françoise Christophe|Jean-Roger Caussimon|Robert Dalban|André Dumas|Max Montavon|Rita Renoir|Jean Ozenne|Henri Serre|Jacques Dynam|Henri Attal|Antoine Baud|Guy Delorme|Hubert de Lapparent|Bob Lerick|Rico Lopez|Paul Pavel|Michel Thomass|Roger Trapp|Dominique Zardi|Roland Giraud|Raymond Pellegrin|Gilbert Servien
title: Fantomas contra Scotland Yard
